Regarding immigration and customs declaration procedures

December 26 on this occasion.  The Department of Population under
the Ministry of Health said that the birth rate in Vietnam
is at an all-time low and forecasts that by
2000, 069, the average population growth rate in
Vietnam will be
zero. The Department of Population said that
this year's total birth rate of  In Vietnam, 1.95 children
per woman continues to decrease compared to 2.01 children
per woman in 2022 and is below the replacement fertility level,
this result does not meet the
set plan of 2.1 children per woman.
Representing this department, fertility decline is a
global trend, but Vietnam is faster than the
world and the alarming situation is increasingly evident,
especially in the Southeast region and the
Mekong Delta with fertility rates continuing to
fall to about 1.  5 children per woman is
typical in localities such as Bac Lieu
Hau Giang Ben Tre Binh Duong
Ho Chi Minh City. According to estimates by 2023,
Ho Chi Minh City's fertility rate is very
low. Only 1.27 children per woman
Currently, only the Northern Midlands and Mountains
and the North Central region have high fertility rates,
according to forecasts. If we stick to the low fertility option, in
just 35 years, Vietnam will
face the reality of a negative population growth rate.
If the fertility decline continues, the Republic of Korea
predicts that by 2500, Vietnam's population will only be 3.6
million people, equal to Nghe An province now.
For more than a month now, Nha Trang general hospital and
birth center have implemented bringing
music into the country.  The hospital's model
demonstration by members of the Hospital Youth Union for the
first time in
this coastal city has brought comfort and reduced

The
performance is expected to be twice a week.
However, after receiving positive feedback
from patients, the hospital board of directors
decided to conduct it regularly every
Monday morning from 7:45
a.m.  In the near future, when

this music performance activity

Binh Tan District, Ho Chi Minh City is still

man stabbed to death after a
traffic collision in Binh Tri
Dong Ward. According to initial information, more than 3:00 p.m.
yesterday just before a  The pawn shop on
Huong Lo 2 street, Binh Tri Dong ward,
had a traffic collision and saw
a man being beaten, so the pawn shop owner went out to
stop him, but that person
beat him back, then a group of people were involved in the
collision.  and started to leave. However, just a few
minutes later, the man who had beaten the pawn shop owner
and another person
on a motorbike returned, one of the two
men grabbed a weapon and rushed in to attack
and stab the person inside.
After the crime, the two suspects escaped from the pawn shop. The
victim was stabbed and was taken to the hospital for emergency
treatment, but died according to the people. The
31-year-old victim was the younger brother of the pawn shop owner.
Last night, a fire broke out.  occurred at
a coffee shop located in Tan Chanh
Hiep Ward, District 12, Ho Chi
Minh City. The fire occurred at about 7:30 p.m. at
a cafe under repair located at
29 Tan Chanh Hiep Street 10 when a
fire was detected.  People in the area tried to
use local water sources to put out the Nhan
Bat Thanh fire. The fire broke out so fiercely that
many people panicked. The
fire prevention and rescue police team of
District 12 police mobilized vehicles and
Officers and soldiers arrived at the scene to try
to put out the fire and at the same time deploy
measures to prevent the fire from spreading. After 15
minutes, the fire was controlled because the
cafe was being repaired and no one
lived, so the fire did not occur.  There were
human casualties, but many properties
in the restaurant were damaged. The cause of the
fire is being clarified by the police.

motorbike was recorded from security camera images. The
thefts were all committed by the same two subjects.
Images taken from security cameras
showed that at about 6:25 p.m. on
December 25, two subjects stopped their motorbikes.
At the motel room located on Street 26,
Long Thanh Ward, My name was Sitting in the back, going
inside the motel room and then breaking the lock to steal
a motorbike in the same ward, more than an

a thief took it.  riding

Phuoc ward, a thief appeared and stole
a motorbike. According to the police's initial assessment, the
suspect broke the lock of his father's motorbike.  The
thief has a very similar outfit
and Nghi is the same person. TNG is

Last night, a motorcyclist
died in a collision with a passenger car on
road Dt741 in the province.  At
about 9:00 p.m. in Binh Phuoc, a passenger car was
traveling on road dt741, heading from
Binh Duong province to Dong Phu district. When the car reached Chi hamlet, Tan Lap commune, it collided with a
motorbike driven by Mr. Hoang Huu Nghia, 38 years old, living in
Tan Lap commune.  The car was turning to
cross the road. The impact was so strong that
he thought he fell down the road and was dragged by a passenger car
70 meters along the road. He lay motionless.
People took him to the emergency room in
critical condition, but he died at the
original hospital.  The cause of the accident is being
investigated and
clarified yesterday in Binh Phuoc, a B-
year-old boy fell into a deep pond and
drowned to death. The victim was Chi Cuong in
Nam Do hamlet, Tan Phuoc commune, Dong Phu district
earlier in the afternoon.  That evening, the family did
not see Cuong. In the house, they
organized a search. When they arrived at the
neighbor's drainage pond, about 400 meters away from the house,
they saw Cuong's sandals
on the shore and two dogs.
He crossed his legs on the edge of the pond and barked loudly, looking in
the direction of the pond, suspecting something bad.
People used a water pump and dived
into the pond. However, because the pond was quite wide and
deep, up to 6 meters, people still couldn't
find the baby.  The rescue force of
Binh Phuoc province police mobilized a
specialized vehicle with dozens of
officers and soldiers at the scene. Searching for the
baby's body until about 9:45 p.m. on the
same day, the rescue force recovered the child's body.  The
victim's body was brought
ashore in connection with the scam to rescue
workers from Cambodia to Vietnam.
In fact, it was a collusion to appropriate the
property of the victim. Police in Binh Duong province
had criminally detained the subject.  Son ferry la,
30 years old, residing in Soc Trang province to investigate and
expand the act of property appropriation. The
initial investigation determined that
La was acquainted with subjects
living in Cambodia who specialized in scamming
Vietnamese victims.  Nam went to
Cambodia to work and created a
tiktok account named after the general so that families
with relatives being held in Cambodia could contact them
for rescue. When someone
contacted them, they asked for a ransom ranging from
150 million to 200 million.  one person
and must transfer the ransom amount 50 minutes in advance,
then I will contact the subjects
in Cambodia to receive the people who have just brought them to the
border gates in Vietnam. I and my
accomplices will take these victims home and
receive the full amount.  The remaining amount of money In case
the family does not give the remaining amount of money, they will
scream with their accomplices and threaten to send the person
back to Cambodia to sell. The police investigation agency
is looking for more victims of the
subjects to continue the investigation.  Clarifying the

V destroyed two rings of trafficking in and storing

largest number of firecrackers from the beginning of 2023 until
now that the locality has discovered and captured.  The
above artillery data was purchased by six subjects residing

from abroad to Vietnam
through unofficial channels and then
transported to Nghe An to avoid

After buying fireworks, the statue did not hide it at home but left it

Loc district police have temporarily criminalized the
